live_updates: Technicians are working to restore service. No ETA at this time but we will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available. Thank you for your patience!
Technicians are on site working to resolve this issue.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
58813.summary: Some customers in Two Mile Corner area of Dryden are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
58813.title: Mar 9 - Dryden (Two Mile Corner)  |  All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
